dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Tuesday, April 04, 2006 7:28 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint
Date:         Mon, 3 Apr 2006 18:21:33 -0600
From:         Cyberia IT <neo@cyberia.ca>
Reply-To:         Cyberia IT <neo@cyberia.ca>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



April 3, 2006

*Sender Information:*
Prozilla.com
Debra Boniface, Owner
neo@cyberia.ca <mailto:neo@cyberia.ca>
1-403-668-1732
103 Fairways Drive
Airdrie, Alberta Canada
T4B2Y5


*Recipient Information:*
ThePlanet.com
Notice of Claims of Copyright Infringement *DMCA Notice of Copyright
Infringement
re: [turnkeyplanet.com (IP *70.85.248.162
<http://www.whois.sc/70.85.248.162>*)]*

Dear ThePlanet.com

I, Debra Boniface, owner of Prozilla.com certify under penalty of perjury,
that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain
intellectual property rights.

I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not
authorized by law for use by the above named domain name owner or their
agents and therefore infringes the copyright owner's rights. I hereby demand
that you act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or
items claimed to be infringing.

My contact information is as follows:

Prozilla.com
Debra Boniface, Owner
neo@cyberia.ca <mailto:neo@cyberia.ca>
1-403-668-1732
103 Fairways Drive
Airdrie, Alberta Canada
T4B2Y5



Allegedly Infringing items or materials:

This person has taken various content and HTML from our main website and a
previous design, wording, graphics. The design the website is using is an
old design we abandoned, however the content we still use is still visible
on our new design. Note the faqs page which has reference to our sister
sites http://www.certahost.com and http://www.turnkey10.com. The owner has
been asked to cooperative and has refused. The following URL should be more
than adequate examples of content taken, especially the name of the style
sheet.

Infringing material that I demand be disabled or removed in consideration of
the above:

http://www.turnkeyplanet.com/
http://www.turnkeyplanet.com/index.php?page=faq
http://www.turnkeyplanet.com/images/styles_prozilla.css
http://www.turnkeyplanet.com/images/tweak.jpg
http://www.turnkeyplanet.com/images/freelance.png

Location of ORIGINAL WORKS:
http://www.prozilla.com
http://www.prozilla.com/faqs.php
http://www.prozilla.com/styles_prozilla.css
http://prozilla.com/images/tweak.jpg
<http://www.turnkeyplanet.com/images/tweak.jpg>
http://www.prozilla.net/thumbs/freelance1chrome.jpg



My actual or electronic signature follows:

Sincerely,
/s/ Debra Boniface
Owner/Operator

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFEMmZYvK/XpJs6oyURAsD3AJoC3NfhEsr9Ovy4cQLA7+mMyG8whACfURpD
iTMjdD/mMBUzeqg7oY6PZCE=
=7edj
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
